divs: Sighting DetailsThe sky at South-West was clear when I looked at it. A bright yellow star-like moving object with constant speed went from South-West towards North-East. It disappeared into the clouds half a minute later. The direction of travel was also constant as the speed.
Summary: The sky was clear when I looked at it. A bright yellow star-like moving object with constant speed went from South-West towards North-East.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Varna
There were no other sightings in Varna on or around January 9th 2010
